```{r rndr, eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
#unique Education Levels

EDLVL <- unique(initial_dta$Education1)

# Filenames

output_file <- paste0(EDLVL,".html")

# List for each Education Level 

params = lapply(EDLVL,FUN = function(x){list(level = x)})

#Data Frame

reports <- tibble(output_file,params)

rmarkdown::render("Project3_draft.Rmd",
              output_file = "Project3",
              params = list(Education1 = 1)
              output_format = "github_document", 
              output_options = list(
                name_value_pairs = "value", 
                toc = TRUE,
                toc_depth = 4, 
                number_of_sections = TRUE, 
                df_print = "paged", 
                or_something = TRUE,
                html_preview = FALSE
                
                )
              )
```
